item.description:
The park has a paved walkway. We will have an on-leash walk. Please bring water and poop bags.

I am asking for a small donation to help with the meetup.com website costs. We are also looking for sponsors.
item.how_to_find_us: From the south, take 93 north to exit 46 Route 110/113. Go around the rotary to Route 113 toward Dracut. Follow 113 into Dracut. The Park will be on your right, the driveway is between Washington Savings Bank and US Post Office.
item.why: The Greater Boston and Merrimack Valley Shiba Inu Meet Up Groups are being combined under the new name of Shiba Inu Meet Up Group of Eastern MA and Southern NH. I have taken on organizing for both and hope to see all of you soon.

group.name: Shiba Inu Meet Up of Eastern MA & Southern NH

item.name: Spring Meet Up
